channel.title: Jmx on Fabrice Aneche
channel.description: Recent content in Jmx on Fabrice Aneche

item.title: JMX query in Python (CPython)
item.description: JMX had good intentions but the API is only implemented in Java, a Java product for Java, with no access to the outside world. Jython was one of the solution but many times I had needed to call JMX from a CPython. Jpype solved this problem and works extremely well. Just install Jpype then try something like this: The execution is really really fast, faster than a jvm run ?? and memory usage is really really slow !
